se.idsec.sigval.xml.xmlstruct.impl

Class DefaultXMLSignatureContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.idsec.sigval.xml.xmlstruct.impl.DefaultXMLSignatureContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XMLSigConstants, XMLSignatureContext

    public class DefaultXMLSignatureContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements XMLSignatureContext, XMLSigConstants
    Provides signature context data related to XML document signatures. This class is instantiated for a specific XML document and a new instance must be created for each processed XML document.
    Author:
    Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)
